Gragas.name: Gragasº
Gragas.title: ºøthe Rabble Rouserº
Gragas.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe only thing more important to Gragas than fighting is drinking. His unquenchable thirst for stronger ale has led him in search of the most potent and unconventional ingredients to toss in his still. Impulsive and unpredictable, this rowdy carouser loves cracking kegs as much as cracking heads. Thanks to his strange brews and temperamental nature, drinking with Gragas is always a risky proposition.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºGragas has an eternal love of good drink, but his massive constitution prevented him from reaching a divine state of intoxication. One night, when he had drained all the kegs and was left wanting, Gragas was struck by a thought rather than the usual barstool: why couldn't he brew himself something that would finally get him truly drunk? It was then that he vowed to create the ultimate ale.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøGragas' quest eventually brought him to the Freljord, where the promise of acquiring the purest arctic water for his recipe led him into uncharted glacial wastes. While lost in an unyielding blizzard, Gragas stumbled upon a great howling abyss. There he found it: a flawless shard of ice unlike anything he had ever seen. Not only did this unmelting shard imbue his lager with incredible properties, but it also had a handy side effect - it kept the mixture chilled at the perfect serving temperature.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºUnder the spell of his new concoction, Gragas headed for civilization, eager to share the fermented fruits of his labor. As fate would have it, the first gathering to catch Gragas' bleary eyes would shape the future of the Freljord. He blundered into a deteriorating negotiation between two tribes discussing an alliance with Ashe. Though Ashe welcomed a break in the tension, the other warriors bristled at the intrusion and hurled insults at the drunken oaf. True to his nature, Gragas replied with a diplomatic headbutt, setting off a brawl matched only in the legends of the Freljord.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen the fallen from that great melee finally awoke, Ashe proposed a friendly drink as an alternative to fighting. With their tempers doused in suds, the two tribes, formerly on the brink of war, bonded over a common love of Gragas' brew. Although strife was averted and Gragas hailed a hero, he still had not achieved his dream of drunken blissfulness. So once more, he set off to wander the tundra in search of ingredients for Runeterra's perfect pint.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºø''Now this'll put hair on your chest!''øºøº
º -- Gragasº
Gragas.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe only thing more important to Gragas than fighting is drinking. His unquenchable thirst for stronger ale has led him in search of the most potent and unconventional ingredients to toss in his still. Impulsive ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøThe buff from Drunken Rage is applied at the end of the channel, so try to use it before going into fight.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøTry to knock enemies back into your towers with Explosive Cask.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøTry to combo Body Slam with Explosive Cask to set up kills for your team.ºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøGragas can knock everybody away with his ultimate.  Be careful that you don't get knocked into him or, worse, an enemy tower.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøBody Slam is on a very low cooldown, making it difficult to pursue Gragas. Don't overextend yourself chasing him.ºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºBarrel Rollº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøGragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 5 seconds.  Enemies struck by the blast have their attack speed lowered.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºGragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated again to explode or will explode on its own after 5 seconds, dealing ºøºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage and applying a ºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºø% attack speed debuff for 3 seconds.ºøº

spells.name: ºDrunken Rageº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøGragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second, restoring his mana.  After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, increasing his damage dealt and reducing damage received.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºø Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask, channeling for 1 second.  He gains ºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºøºøºø mana while channeling, and becomes empowered after finishing, increasing physical attack damage by øºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøº, and reducing damage taken by ºøº{{ e1 }}ºø% for 20 seconds.º

spells.name: ºBody Slamº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøGragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and slowing their movement.  Damage is split among units hit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøGragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit he hits, dealing ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºøºøº magic damage to enemies in the area. Damage is split among targets hit. Units hit by Body Slam are slowed by 35% for 2.5 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøExplosive Caskº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøGragas hurls his cask to a location, which explodes on impact, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.  ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøGragas throws his cask to an area. Upon landing, it deals øºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage to all units struck, knocking them back.ºøºøº

passive.name: ºHappy Hourº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøOn ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 2% of his max health over 4 seconds.ºøºøºøºøº
